definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: If the above situation does not, you can apply to telecommunications.
sentences.chinese: 如果上面情况没有，也可以去电信局办理。

sentences.english: OK, I'll get you an overseas operator.
sentences.chinese: 好，我替你接电信局国际台。

sentences.english: This number was just assigned to me by the phone company.
sentences.chinese: 这号码是电信局刚分派给我的。

sentences.english: The system runs in the telephone and telegraph office in C city.
sentences.chinese: 该系统已在C市电信局稳定运行。

sentences.english: I'm going to see a Telecom director this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午我要去见电信局的一位经理。

sentences.english: Telephone users are required to pay their bills at the telecommunications office.
sentences.chinese: 请固定电话用户按时到电信局缴费。

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Yi2 dong4 Tong1 xin4

definition: DMV (department of motor vehicles) (abbr. for 公安局交通管理局車輛管理所|公安局交通管理局车辆管理所)
China Netcom (CNC), former telecommunication service provider in PRC
public security bureau (government office similar in function to a police station)
